resources.string: Please point your smartphone camera to QR code displayed on MYNIC authenticator page. You may need to move your phone away or closer to image in order for the camera to focus.
Sorry, the Android camera encountered a problem. You may need to restart the device.
Scan and save many barcodes continuously
Store multiple scans of the same barcode in History
Try to retrieve more information about the barcode contents
Scan for white barcodes on black background. Not available on some devices.
The registration code has expired. Please request for a new one. (005)
Could not connect to the server. Please make sure you have a working network connection. (101)
Failed to unregister your account from GRIDGOO server. (008)
There was a database system error on the server. (102)
This mobile phone has already been registered with another user. (103)

There was a database system error on the server. (105)
There was a database system error on the server. (106)

Your username does not exist in GRIDGOO server. (123)
Invalid request sent to the server. (110)
There was an unknown error on the server.
